instruction: Rewrite the two paragraphs so that the idea is expressed in less words without changing its meaning.
input: The COVID-19 pandemic has had wide-ranging impacts on the economy and society, from the disruption of global supply chains to the loss of jobs. From a public health viewpoint, it has had a greater toll than any other pandemic in recent history, with over a million deaths worldwide.
output: The COVID-19 pandemic has had a significant economic and societal impact, from global supply chain disruption to mass layoffs. In terms of public health, it's the worst pandemic in recent history, leading to more than a million deaths worldwide.
